text: ka-alladhina min qablikum kanu ashadda minkum quwwatan wa-akthara amwalan wa-awladan fa-is'tamta平u bikhalaqihim fa-is'tamta平tum bikhalaqikum kama is'tamta平a alladhina min qablikum bikhalaqihim wakhud'tum ka-alladhi khadu ulaika habitat a平maluhum fi l-dun'ya wal-akhirati wa-ulaika humu l-khasiruna
